title: Samsung’s Cheapest Smartwatch is On Sale for $40 OFF!
description: Check out this deal on the Galaxy Watch FE. The post Samsung’s Cheapest Smartwatch is On Sale for $40 OFF! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Check out this deal on the Galaxy Watch FE.
text: Samsung’s large selection of tech products are some of the better ones you can find on the market, and this includes pretty much everything from smartphones, TVs, all the way down to wearables. Speaking of wearables, Samsung’s affordable Galaxy Watch FE is currently on sale right now with a deal that brings down its price by as much 16% off. In terms of hardware, the Galaxy Watch FE is available in black, pink gold and silver, with an aluminum case that wraps around a 1.2-inch Super AMOLED touch display. As with most Wear OS devices, it also comes with 5ATM + IP68 certification for added water resistance. The device comes with Samsung’s own Exynos W920 chip, alongside 1.5GB RAM and 16GB of storage for apps. The Galaxy Watch FE also has a wealth of sensors onboard, which include a Samsung BioActive Sensor (Optical Heart Rate + Electrical Heart + Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis), Accelerometer, Barometer, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, and a Light Sensor. You can check out the deal below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
Samsung’s large selection of tech products are some of the better ones you can find on the market, and this includes pretty much everything from smartphones, TVs, all the way down to wearables. Speaking of wearables, Samsung’s affordable Galaxy Watch FE is currently on sale right now with a deal that brings down its price by as much 16% off.

In terms of hardware, the Galaxy Watch FE is available in black, pink gold and silver, with an aluminum case that wraps around a 1.2-inch Super AMOLED touch display. As with most Wear OS devices, it also comes with 5ATM + IP68 certification for added water resistance. The device comes with Samsung’s own Exynos W920 chip, alongside 1.5GB RAM and 16GB of storage for apps.

The Galaxy Watch FE also has a wealth of sensors onboard, which include a Samsung BioActive Sensor (Optical Heart Rate + Electrical Heart + Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis), Accelerometer, Barometer, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, and a Light Sensor. You can check out the deal below.
